result.title: Allowing participants to view their wrong answers after the contest has started
result.content:
Hi,

I made a contest using Mashup and added it to a private group. The contest test policy was first set to "Do not show". After the contest started and some people submitted, I wanted to change the test policy to "Show failed test of own submission". After I edited the contest to be like that, users are still unable to view the test cases in their submissions even if those submissions were made after I did my edit. Is there a way to allow participants to view their failing test cases? Do I have to create a new contest for that?

I have now tried to start a clone contest with the test policy set to "show failed test of own submission" and it still never shows the contestants their submissions test cases, just the code. Is there another option that needs to be adjusted for this to work?
